body: I have now learned how and it is self taught. I should not have wrote the previous thing but I still agree with my opinion. He can’t always use her as that is not the lesson. Anyways, this comment is undesirable to read and I just wanted to update whoever reads this comment that 3 days ago I learned how to do it properly entirely on my own and also using a bunch of tiny scenes from this website to create my new technique as the last one felt better but wasn’t very good to use. Anyways bye and I may come back in a long time.

body: I want to kill everyone I thought she was gonna do a proper tutorial for a second and we get this disappointment. I am annoyed I can’t use that technique. Not everyone is a protagonist that gets 82847474894 girls to help them. I am annoyed now and disappointed. I was looking forward to a full tutorial. (Oh and btw I’m embarrassed to look it up if u say that.) I have never watched any stuff with real people and I’m kinda scared to lol so when I saw this I was super excited.
Is this from the same artist as Sweet guy?

I admit - I do love the over the top sexy character designs.  That said, reposting something that already has the other 47 chapters posted is silly.  And let's admit: the people in this comic are dumb as rocks.  "Sex? I'm 18 and don't know what sex or masturbation is!"

Yeah.  Right.
